p.head: 69 William Horton Self Dr
69 Sarah Cozart PP Wm Horton Dr
70 James Daniel Self Dr

div.note: Sarah Cozart -- first woman I've seen transacting business at the store. Also doesn't have her own account, but is under William Horton's. (Wonder what their relationship was.)
Baxter's transactions are odd -- "self PP self" PP usually means "buying on behalf of" but he's buying on behalf of himself? Maybe just a "typo"?
categorized Moulds as a kitchen implement, but thinking maybe not now. Could it be for brickmaking? Would go with "pipes" for building? Do you have an "unknown" category? (Need a place to put it!)
